long_description: The Eagle Creek Tarmac 28 wheeled luggage offers plenty of space for long adventures, with built-in durability and convenient travel features. Tarmac 28 is made from rugged Bi-Tech(TM) fabrics for extreme abrasion and weather resistance. Includes rugged wheels with sturdy wheel housing, a skid plate, bumper protection and a travel-tested handle system. Quick-grab lockable top pocket contains a coat keeper for attaching your jacket, a key fob with bottle opener and an attached piggyback clip to securely attach another bag. Main pocket features a zippered cargo net that supplies compression when used inside; or attach it to the outside of the bag for use as a utility net. Large interior zip mesh pocket. #10 lockable zippers secure main compartment and have finger-friendly zipper pulls; luggage locks are sold separately. 2 exterior compression straps help stabilize and secure luggage contents. Reflective accents improve dusk and nighttime visibility. Integrates with Eagle Creek Pack-It(R) Systems, sold separately.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Tarmac 28 wheeled luggage offers plenty of space for long adventures, with built-in durability and convenient travel features.
